pr_title: BLUEBUTTON-1900: Ensure all FHIR resources have a lastUpdated value

timeline.message:
Added a FALLBACK_LAST_UPDATED value

- Used when a null lastUpdated value is in the SQL record

timeline.bodyText: This is an arbitrary date that is before any actual lastUpdated values. I've chosen the first second of the year, to look arbitrary.
timeline.author: RickHawesUSDS
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -225,4 +227,10 @@
    */
   static final String CODING_BBAPI_BENE_HICN_HASH_OLD =
       "http://bluebutton.cms.hhs.gov/identifier#hicnHash";
+
+  /**
+   * Fallback value to use when a record does not have a lastUpdated value. These records where
+   * loaded before the lastUpdated feature was in place.
+   */
+  static final Date FALLBACK_LAST_UPDATED = Date.from(Instant.parse("2020-01-01T00:00:00Z"));
 }

timeline.message: Fix the order of the lastUpdated test
